abstract: Albert Gonzalez, who the government accuses of masterminding the largest credit card number theft in history, says his indictment in New Jersey this week scotched a pending settlement.
snippet: Albert Gonzalez, who the government accuses of masterminding the largest credit card number theft in history, says his indictment in New Jersey this week scotched a pending settlement.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:54 p.m. Clarified that all the charges brought against Albert Gonzalez have been by federal prosecutors, although through different United States attorney’s offices in Massachusetts, New York and New Jersey.

headline.main: Hacking Suspect’s Lawyer Criticizes Federal Prosecutors
